dt: {bc}of or relating to the latest period of the Stone Age characterized by polished stone implements
{bc}belonging to an earlier age and now outmoded

et: Term introduced, along with {it}Paleolithic,{/it} by the British politician and scientist Sir John Lubbock (1834-1913) in {it}Pre-historic Times, as Illustrated by Ancient Remains, and the Manners and Customs of Modern Savages{/it} (London, 1865), p. 3.
shortdef: of or relating to the latest period of the Stone Age characterized by polished stone implements
belonging to an earlier age and now outmoded
